text: The Kilgore Film Festival of Kilgore, Texas, United States, began in 1998 under the sponsorship of KTPB, the former public radio station of Kilgore College. Each year a festival is held in the Spring and Fall offering moviegoers a chance to see unique and award-winning selections. The festival is held at Kilgore's 4 Star Cinema. ==Notes== == External links == * KZQX Radio Kilgore Film Festival * Kilgore Film Festival Facebook Category:Film festivals in Texas
title: Kilgore Film Festival
